title: binning
description: Conversion of (pre-processed) expression count data into relative values (bins) to address scale differences across sequencing batches.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file.

input_layer.help_text: Type: `string`. Mudata layer (key from .layers) to use as input data for binning. If not specified, .X is used.

n_input_bins.description: Type: `integer`, default: `51`. The number of bins to discretize the data into
n_input_bins.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `51`. The number of bins to discretize the data into. When no value is provided, data won't be binned.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. The output h5mu file containing the binned data
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. The output h5mu file containing the binned data.

output_compression.description: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression algorithm to use for the output h5mu file
output_compression.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `gzip`, choices: ``gzip`, `lzf``. The compression algorithm to use for the output h5mu file.

binned_layer.description: Type: `string`, default: `binned`. The name of the adata layer to write the binned data to
binned_layer.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `binned`. The name of the adata layer to write the binned data to.

seed.description: Type: `integer`. Seed for random number generation
seed.help_text: Type: `integer`. Seed for random number generation.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
